Description_lang: While inside the Maw or Torghast, your spells and abilities have a chance to drain a Soul Fragment from your target, granting you $s3 Primary stat for $356042d and stacking up to $356042u times.When you reach $356042u stacks, unleash Chaos Bane, dealing $s5 Shadow damage split between nearby enemies and granting you $s4 Primary stat for $356043d.
